nodes.text: Ferrid was a male Human Sith Lord of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Great Galactic War. During the war in c. 3665 BBY, Ferrid managed to steal a Republic superweapon, but was soon captured and send to the Belsavis prison. Here, Ferrid stayed for 24 years until he was freed by the fighting during the Galactic War and with the help of a Sith spacer he moved to obtain his revenge on the Republic.
